pageProduct.name: Olay Luminous Niacinamide Super Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Treatment Serum reduces dark spots for radiant skin. Look up to 10 years younger in just 4 weeks. Brightens & evens skin. Reduces dark spots by 54% in 8 weeks.

- Exfoliates the surface for skin that is visibly smoother and brighter.

-  Brightens & evens skin. Reduces dark spots by 54% in 8 weeks. 


- Quickly penetrates 10 surface layers deep, to help accelerate skin's turnover rate to reveal the natural pearlescent glow of your skin.


- Hydrating formula with a Brightening Complex delivers tone ingredients 10 layers deep into skin surface, fading the look of dark spots over time.


- Fast-absorbing, Non-greasy and Lightly-scented formula


- Recommended to use after the Olay Regenerist Luminous Brightening Cream Cleanser and before the Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturiser


Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Treatment helps to diminish the appearance of dark spots for your most beautiful, vibrant skin with a pearlescent healthy glow. Visibly fading dark spots and discoloration in just 4 weeks, this tone perfecting treatment regenerates your youthful glow. Look up to 10 years younger in just 4 weeks!


How it Works:


2 Weeks: Skin has more even texture for a healthy-looking, youthful luminosity. 


4 Weeks: The appearance of dark spots and discoloration are effectively diminished to reveal your most beautiful, even skin tone. 



Find out more at Olay.com.au

Size: 30mL

KEY FEATURES

• Brightens and evens skin; reduces dark spots by 54% in 8 weeks
• Concentrated formula to reduce the look of dark spots, for visibly more even tone and texture in 28 days
• Hydrating formula with a Brightening Complex delivers tone ingredients 10 layers deep into skin surface, fading the look of dark spots over time
• Quickly penetrates 10 surface layers deep, to help accelerate skin's turnover rate to reveal the natural pearlescent glow of your skin
• FORMULATED WITHOUT^: Sulphates, Parabens, Phthalates, Petrolatum and Mineral Oils
• FORMULATED WITH: Niacinamide 99% Purity (Vitamin B3) Pro-vit B5 Vitamin E
• ^excludes impurities due to manufacturing process
• Exfoliates the surface for skin that is visibly smoother and brighter

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.
If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water.
If skin irritation develops, discontinue use.

Ingredients

Water, Hexyldecanol, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Xylitol, Tapioca Starch, Panthenol, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Dimethicone, Boron Nitride, Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Mica, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Inositol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-11 Methyl Ether Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyacrylamide, Benzyl Alcohol, Undecylenoyl Phenylalanine, Aminomethyl Propanol, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Laureth-7, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Fragrance, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, CI 77891, CI 16035

Directions

Use 2 pumps twice a day after cleansing and toning, and before moisturizer. Apply evenly on face until the serum is absorbed. How to use the auto-dropper: (1) Twist and turn the cap to automatically draw out the serum (2) Press and hold the pump to dispense on palm or fingers.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
